channel.title: Leviathan - OsharuPérez & JL Music [Dubstep, Collab]
channel.description:
:spotify:: https://open.spotify.com/album/10ZOzOck13Pr7YSD23uRXa iTunes: Whenever Apple feels like accepting the piece of music on their platform, since Amuse’s releases seem to have issues for there lately. SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/jl_official/leviathan-collab
New release with @Osharu, this one took almost a month to release due to Amuse being outright terrible with delays due to artwork and other problems with what should be _simple_ communication. Regardless of technical difficulties, I am happy to present the fruit of our collaboration. Go get it, Ahab.
![LevArtwork50SatFix|500x500](upload://3S1EhsMqaVb77GKyTWCfAVneHDN.jpeg)

item.title: Leviathan - OsharuPérez & JL Music [Dubstep, Collab]
item.dc:creator: Osharu
item.description:
Of course buddy!! I’d love to collab again!! I’m currently at work, (lunch break), but send me something my way, and I’ll see what I can come up with!

Read full topic

item.title: Leviathan - OsharuPérez & JL Music [Dubstep, Collab]
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Thanks! Glad it finally was ready for release on my end as well.

As for another collab… maybe? Depends on how Osharu feels about it ;3
